documentation.content: Connections dropped value is derived from the connections accepted minus the connections handled. This value should be near 0. When this value is rising, then this means you may have a resource saturation problem.

conditionMonitoringQueryLanguage.query:
{ t_0:
    fetch
      prometheus_target ::
      prometheus.googleapis.com/nginx_connections_accepted/counter
; t_1:
    fetch
      prometheus_target ::
      prometheus.googleapis.com/nginx_connections_handled/counter }
| outer_join 0
| value val(0) - val(1)
| align rate(5m)
| condition val() > 0
